home.description: Records of Light and Dust. A personal blog by Shikochin.

about.title: About Me
about.ruinsDesc: What is said originates from what is thought, and what is thought is also transformed into what is said, yet it has never been fully described; I still hope these words can occupy a place and become ruins. Reality is often unsatisfactory, and beautiful words should not be bound; they survive in the ruins and flourish with the ruins themselves.
about.bio: Nishimiya Shiko, also known as Shikochin. {age} years old, living in China, a high school student. Creating ruins to leave some of my thoughts and daily life. I started messing with personal blogs in 2021, and they never turned out as expected, but I've learned a lot from it.
